飍字的基本解释

飍
xiū
惊跑的样子：“驰谢如惊飍。”

飍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiū］
［《廣韻》香幽切，平幽，曉。］
(1)指风。
(2)惊奔貌。参见“飍矞”。

飍字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【風字部】　飍； 康熙笔画：27； 页码：页1415第10
【廣韻】【集韻】?香幽切，音烋。【廣韻】驚風。　又【玉篇】驚走貌。【左思·吳都賦】儋耳黑齒之酋，金鄰象郡之渠。驫䮅飍矞靸霅，驚捷先驅前途。【註】驫音浮，駥音月，飍音休，矞音聿，靸音撒，霅音匣。言外國渠酋，馳走爲吳王前導也。蓋借疾風形，擬奔走之狀也。　又【集韻】必幽切，音彪。又步幽切，音淲。義?同。

考證：〔【左思·吳都賦】儋耳黑齒之酋，金潾象郡之渠。驫䮅飍矞靸霅，驚捷〕　謹照原文金潾改金鄰。
飍字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
飍字的起名意思

惊跑的样子。

Basic explanation of words
Steamed
xiū
The appearance of stunned running: "Chi Xie is like a fright."
Steamed
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiū］
["Guangyun" fragrant and quiet, quiet, and dawn. ]
(1) Refers to the wind.
(2) Surprised appearance. See "飍矞".
Steamed
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 2] [Feng Zi Department] 　飍; Kangxi strokes: 27; page number: page 1415-10
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Fragrant and quiet, sound awkward. [Guangyun] Shocking wind.　[Jade Chapter] Shocked and stunned. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] The chieftain of Dan'er and black teeth, the canal of Jinlinxiang County. Hustle and bustle, stun the future of the pioneer. [Note] Yuanyin Floating, Fu Yinyue, Moyinxiu, Yanyinyu, Diaoyinsa, Grape Sound Box. It is said that the chieftain of the foreign country Qu, fleeing as the leader of the king of Wu. Covered by the shape of a gust of wind, it is like a rush.　[Jiyun] It must be quiet and sound. Step further, Yin Nao. Righteous? Same. Textual research: [[Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] The chieftain with black teeth and ears, the canal of Xiangjun in Jinling.骉䮅靸靸霅, astounding] 　 I would like to change Jin Lin to Jin Lin according to the original text.
